name: Claude Code CLI
description: Bridge provider that routes requests to the Claude Code CLI via HTTP bridge.

claudePath.description: Path to the claude CLI binary

codexPath.description: Path to the codex CLI binary (default: auto-detect)

codexModels.description: Model IDs that route to the Codex CLI backend

geminiPath.description: Path to the gemini CLI binary (default: auto-detect)

geminiModels.description: Model IDs that route to the Gemini CLI backend

mcpConfigPath.description: Path to MCP servers JSON config file (passed to claude --mcp-config)

cwd.description: Default working directory for Claude processes
